prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Organ, Guitar, Piano, Drums, but without Pipe.
captions:
Style 1:
This song features Bass, Organ, Guitar, Piano, and Drums, but Pipe is absent.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Bass, Organ, Guitar, Piano, and Drums, with no Pipe.

Style 3:
This piece is played with Bass, Organ, Guitar, Piano, and Drums, Pipe excluded.
